questions.question: Have you worked with game engines like Unity or Unreal Engine?
Are you comfortable with C# or C++ for game development?
Do you understand core game mechanics and gameplay loops?
Have you created 2D or 3D game graphics?
Are you familiar with game physics and collision detection?
Have you implemented character animations in games?
Have you designed game UI/UX interfaces?
Have you developed multiplayer or networked games?
Do you know game performance optimization techniques?
Have you published a game on any platform?
